class.name: Change Controllers
class.description: A plugin for loading the different controllers. It allows to load the desired type of controllers for all the joints in the Shadow Robot Hand (all the same type). The plugin does not read the current state of the controllers, so if the controllers are loaded from outside the plugin, the initial state of the plugin will be inconsistent with the state of the controllers. The Stop button stops all the currently running controllers, even if different types of controllers are running for the different joints.

qtgui.label: Change Controllers
qtgui.statustip: A plugin for loading the desired type of controller for all the joints in the Shadow Robot Hand.
